descriptionHtml:
Analyst at Ernest Partners

Location: Brussels

Full-time


👋 About Ernest Partners

We’re the bridge between companies and financiers. Our mission?

·       Understand businesses inside out—financially and strategically

·       Explore and model funding scenarios

·       Help leadership choose the best path forward in funding and financing

·       Guide companies through negotiations with banks, investors and financiers

We’re growing—and we’re looking for you as an Analyst to join our team and grow with us.



💼 What You’ll Do

As an Analyst, you’ll be involved in every step of the process—from analysis to execution. You’ll:

·       Build financial models and run scenario analyses

·       Research and present market insights

·       Brainstorm solutions for clients’ financial challenges

·       Creation of pitch decks and information memoranda

·       Join client meetings and support senior team members on live transactions

·       Contribute ideas to improve how we work



🌟 Who You Are

We’re not just hiring a CV—we’re hiring a mindset.

You might be a great fit if you’re:

🧠   Analytical: You love digging into data but never lose sight of the big picture

🔍   Curious: You ask smart questions and want to keep learning

🤝   Collaborative: You thrive in a team but can also work independently

🚀   Entrepreneurial: You adapt quickly and love a challenge

Your background:

🎓   Master’s in Economics, Finance, Management, or similar

📊   1–3 years of experience in banking, funding, audit, or financial controlling

💻   Skilled in Excel, PowerPoint & Word—and excited about how AI can boost productivity

🌍  Fluent in Dutch and English. French is a plus.



💡 Why Join Us?

·       Work closely with CXOs on real, complex financial challenges

·       Learn from experienced professionals in finance and business

·       Enjoy flexible hours and hybrid work (3 days/week in our Brussels’ office)

·       Be part of a diverse, inclusive, and values-driven team

·       Get rewarded with a competitive salary—and bonuses tied to your impact

·       Grow in a company that values Durability, Collaboration, and Adaptability



📩 Ready to Apply?

Send your CV to Nicolas.van.klinkenberg@ernestpartners.eu, we can’t wait to meet you.
